---
title: "Developer Notes"
---

The following command generates the standalone graphical user interface (on Mac):

```bash
cd gui/
python -m eel ace_gui.py views \
    --onedir --noconsole --clean \
    --icon ace_gui.ico \
    --name ACE \
    --copy-metadata tqdm \
    --copy-metadata regex \
    --copy-metadata filelock \
    --copy-metadata requests \
    --copy-metadata packaging \
    --copy-metadata numpy \
    --copy-metadata torch \
    --add-data "trained_model_w_data_augmentation_b3000.pt:."
```

The following command generates the standalone graphical user interface (on Windows):

```bash
cd gui/
python -m eel ace_gui.py views \
    --onedir --noconsole --clean \
    --icon ace_gui.ico \
    --name ACE \
    --copy-metadata tqdm \
    --copy-metadata regex \
    --copy-metadata filelock \
    --copy-metadata requests \
    --copy-metadata packaging \
    --copy-metadata numpy \
    --copy-metadata torch \
    --add-data "trained_model_w_data_augmentation_b3000.pt;."
```
